name: chrome-control
description: Control Google Chrome browser - open tabs, navigate, execute JavaScript, and more
long_description:
# Chrome Browser Control Extension

A powerful Chrome browser automation extension for Claude Desktop that enables:

- Opening and closing tabs
- Navigating to URLs
- Executing JavaScript in pages
- Getting page content and information
- Managing browser history
- Searching and filtering tabs

Uses Chrome DevTools Protocol for reliable browser control.
